name: V_EHI_PAX_PB_ACCT_TX_DIST_HX
description: This view filters out premium billing transaction data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium account transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter for the transaction distribution history item.

columns.name: DIST_DATE
columns.description: Date that the payment distribution took place in the system.

columns.name: HIST_PB_INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing invoice associated with the distribution.

columns.name: HIST_PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the account transaction associated with the distribution.
